The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 07 April is 41,559 (4,810.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 April, there were 163 new confirmed cases (18.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 March, there were 233 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (70 fewer cases).
